##### FILE: hostpathvolumes067.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes0670.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

kind: Pod
metadata:

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

  securityContext:

    name: volume-emptydir

    name: volume-hostpath

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes0724.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes0833.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes088.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

kind: Pod

  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

        drop:
        - ALL

    seccompProfile:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1101.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1102.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

apiVersion: v1

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1157.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:

    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/


pass: 7, fail: 9, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

apiVersion: v1

    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

  - hostPath:

kind: Pod

  name: hostpathvolumes1

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

      type: RuntimeDefault

      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1264.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes130.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes131.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:

        - ALL

    runAsNonRoot: true

      type: RuntimeDefault

  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath-b

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes141.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:

    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath-b

kind: Pod
metadata:

  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    name: initcontainer1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

      type: RuntimeDefault

    name: volume-hostpath-a

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes145.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes146.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1

    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath-b

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes147.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes148.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1489.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes150.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes151.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

kind: Pod

  name: hostpathvolumes1

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1541.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:

      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b
